function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 impacting the construction industry globally","Impact":"Significant economic and productivity issues for contractors","Mitigation":"Implementing strict safety measures at construction sites, providing financial aid and relief","Technologies":"Contactless technology, digital communication tools for remote work","People":"Contractors, laborers, construction workers","Owner":"Government, health authorities, construction industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Suspension and reduction of construction projects leading to loss of income for contractors","Impact":"Financial strain on contractors, potential bankruptcy","Mitigation":"Financial aid, extension of project timelines, renegotiation of contracts","Technologies":"Project management software, digital contract platforms","People":"Contractors, construction workers","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, construction industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Disruptions in the supply chain and labor shortage affecting contractor productivity","Impact":"Reduced progress on projects, increased costs, delays","Mitigation":"Alternative sourcing, labor management strategies, financial assistance for additional costs","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, labor management systems","People":"Contractors, suppliers, laborers","Owner":"Construction industry stakeholders, government"}]}
